body_html:
I think this adds an op and will need API review. Could you run:

   $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True

and push again? It'll be clear what the API change is.
body_text:
I think this adds an op and will need API review. Could you run:
   $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True

and push again? It'll be clear what the API change is.
body:
I think this adds an op and will need API review. Could you run:

```
   $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True
```

and push again? It'll be clear what the API change is.
